issue.title: Transform from X2_1/base_link/imu_sensor to X2_1/base_link is unavailable

content.raw:
Unfortunately your link does not work \(Request has expired\).

I don’t understand why I have to define a transform from odom to the robot-frame. I would expect this from the localization node. For me this seems to work so in Gazebo 9:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/3818829604-Bildschirmfoto_von_2019-07-29_23-27-48.png)
Is there something special or new in the newer version that I have to define to get the connection between odom and X2\_1/base\_link?
